N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.12 - Berth assignment permits; time for filing and information

State Regulations
(a) All persons
desiring a berth for any watercraft at a marine terminal shall, at least three
days prior to the arrival of such watercraft, apply to The Port Authority of

New York and New Jersey Marine Operations Division, 111 Eighth Avenue, New

York, New York 10011, between the hours of 8:45 a.m. and 4:45 p.m., except on

Saturdays, Sundays and holidays, for a berth assignment and shall furnish the
following information: (1)

Name and address
of applicant; (2)

Name of
watercraft's owner or operator if applicant is a general agent or local
agent; (3)

Name of
watercraft; (4)

Length of
watercraft overall; (5)

Beam of
watercraft; (6)

Draft of
watercraft; (7)

Gross registered
tonnage of watercraft; (8)

Date of
arrival of watercraft; (9)

Probable
date of departure of watercraft; (10)

Amount of cargo (in tons) to be loaded
or discharged; (11)

Type of
cargo. (b) The request, if made orally, shall promptly be confirmed in writing. Notes
